categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Operation: Insignificant was an Alliance to Restore the Republic coordinated campaign to hit multiple Imperial and Lant Mining Corporation across the Brak sector. Brak Sector Forces attacked multiple LMC refineries, mines and distribution centers. Projected repair time for the facilities was estimated at ten to fourteen months. Several Imperial light cruisers were ambushed and destroyed. Most Alliance mission objectives were achieved, although impromptu action over Lish V resulted in the loss of half of Oracle Squadron.
